FAQ’s

Most frequently asked questions

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1555531966068{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6″][vc_tta_accordion active_section=”1″ style=”style2″][vc_tta_section title=”What Delivery Methods Are Available?” tab_id=”1522322738673-aea3abb5-b800fe1b-0bf9cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]We deliver using either SafeBoda, or our own personnel.

Incase you wish to pick your package up yourself, or have your own courier pick it up, please contact us via our Social Media accounts, or email us at sales@belledenavy.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are your shipping and return policies?” tab_id=”1522322738697-88e8c59b-62ccfe1b-0bf9cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]In the event that you are unable to immediately receive your package and wish for us to hold onto it for a while, simply reach out and let us know. We will do so

We have a 48 hour refund policy, and the item should be returned in it’s original packaging.

The item should not be dirtied, torn or mishandled in any way, and the tags should still be attached to it. Please visit our “Refunds & Exchanges” page for more details.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do You Ship Internationally?” tab_id=”1522322884722-77aa01b6-d3ecfe1b-0bf9cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]At the moment, we only deliver within Uganda.

However, if you wish to have a package shipped internationally, we can do so, -Provided you will cater for the shipping cost.

*Please note that Belle de Navy will not be held liable if anything happens to your order after we have handed it over to the Shipping Courier Service of your choosing.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-3″][vc_column_text]

Shopping Basics

Payments

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6″][vc_tta_accordion active_section=”1″ style=”style2″][vc_tta_section title=”What Payment Methods Are Accepted?” tab_id=”1555532166627-d18a27a7-6515cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]Mobile Money, Credit Cards and Cash.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do you accept international credit cards?” tab_id=”1555532166698-b9e07fe9-85b4cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]Yes, we do.

You can opt for payment via credit card at the checkout.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1555531966068{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-3″][vc_column_text]

Shipping & Returns

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6″][vc_tta_accordion active_section=”1″ style=”style2″][vc_tta_section title=”I want to return my purchase! What do I do?” tab_id=”1554865954832-7b4f4f32-3205cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]Either:

  1. WhatsApp us on 0786799379
  2. Send us a message via our Instagram account
  3. Email us at sales@belledenavy.com
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How long does it take for me to get a refund?” tab_id=”1554865954888-c3d499b3-2d6ecf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]If there are no issues with the returned item, we will process the refund in less than 24 hours.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How can I get assistance if I need it?” tab_id=”1554865955032-f07c32a3-1c21cf30-de7d”][vc_column_text]Simply reach out via either

  • WhatsApp
  • Instagram
  • Email (contact@belledenavy.com)
  • Phone: 0786799379
